title: Finnigan the Dragon
description: Finnigan McDoodle Magoo Magee he lives in the land of literacy. A castle his home not the sort you might think. For him a library filled with books, paper, pen and ink. Other titles by Julie Ann The Cows are in the Garden, It's Rhyming Peas and Carrots, The Pepper Tree Story, How the Seeds are Planted and The Tooth Be Told.
author: Julie Ann James
